actions.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Page 110, after line 8, insert the following: ?   TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ?   SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occurring outside the United States.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds from being used to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occurring outside the United States.
